tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE HazardousWasteDocumentation (
    waste_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_type VARCHAR(50),
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposal_location VARCHAR(100),
    disposal_method VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    waste_id INT,
    disposal_date DATE,
    regulatory_agency VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_status VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (waste_id) REFERENCES HazardousWasteDocumentation(waste_id)
);

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations (
  document_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_date DATE,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE waste_generator (
  generator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  generator_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  contact_person VARCHAR(150),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_tracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disposal_site VARCHAR(100),
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_method VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_cost DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE hazardous_waste_disposal_regulations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  document_name VARCHAR(255),
  document_type VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50),
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_site_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (disposal_site_id) REFERENCES waste_disposal_sites(site_id)
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_certificates (
  certificate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(100),
  valid_until DATE,
  issued_by VARCHAR(100),
  UNIQUE (company_name)
)

CREATE TABLE HazardousWasteDisposalRegulations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    document_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposal_location VARCHAR(100),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalFacilities (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    facility_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    facility_type VARCHAR(50),
    capacity DOUBLE,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalManifests (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    manifest_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    disposal_date DATE,
    facility_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES WasteDisposalFacilities(id),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE WasteDisposalRecords (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    record_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    document_id INT NOT NULL,
    disposal_date DATE,
    facility_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES HazardousWasteDisposalRegulations(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES WasteDisposalFacilities(id),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceOfficers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    officer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    officer_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    officer_phone VARCHAR(15),
    certification_status BOOLEAN
);
